Name: Science!
Requirement: Perform research for the first time.

Name: Dealbreaker
Requirement: Respond to an alien's trade offer by fighting.

Name: Break out the big guns
Requirement: Kill an alien of another species.

Name: Anyone out there?
Requirement: Broadcast a message to the world

Name: Megaphone
Requirement: Broadcast a message across the universe

Name: High-tech death ray
Requirement: Spend more than 35 energy on a single fight with a single alien
